sn22.46:1.5: yadanatta tam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn22.46:1.12: yadanatta tam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn22.46:2.1: Evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya passato pubbantanuditthiyo na honti.
sn22.46:2.3: Aparantanuditthinam asati, thamaso paramaso na hoti.
sn22.46:2.8: vinnanasmim cittam virajjati vimuccati anupadaya asavehi.
sn22.46:2.9: Vimuttatta thitam. Thitatta santusitam. Santusitatta na paritassati. Aparitassam paccattanneva parinibbayati.
sn22.46:2.10: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
